ComicInfo.Summary:
Embedded: Behind Enemy Lines [Part Two]: With most of New York deserted thanks to the Hulk and his Warbound, Sally and Ben continue to canvas the city looking for those left behind. Sally interviews Daredevil. During a pitched battle between the Hulk and the Fantastic Four, the entire city loses power.
War Is Heck [Part One]: S.H.I.E.L.D. uses Captain Rectitude to bait a trap for the Hulk.
Costume Division: Death of an Android [Part One]: Danny and Korg partner up to find the killer of ARCH-E. Danny unwittingly takes an alien oath to find the murderer in twenty-four hours or forfeit his life.
ComicInfo.Title: Embedded: Behind Enemy Lines [Part Two]; War Is Heck [Part One]; Costume Division: Death of an Android [Part One]
